mapper.select: SELECT BUYLIST_DATE, PRODUCT_NAME, BUY_CNT, BUY_TOTALPRICE, PRODUCT_ID FROM BUYLISTVIEW ORDER BY BUYLIST_DATE desc

select BUYLIST_DATE, PRODUCT_NAME, BUY_CNT, BUY_TOTALPRICE, PRODUCT_ID from BUYLISTVIEW
WHERE BUYLIST_DATE >= to_date(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND BUYLIST_DATE <= to_date(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY BUYLIST_DATE desc
SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ADDRESS, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_EMAIL FROM MEMBER

SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ADDRESS, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_EMAIL FROM MEMBER
WHERE member_id like '%'||#{searchword}||'%'
WHERE member_name like '%'||#{searchword}||'%'
WHERE member_address like '%'||#{searchword}||'%'
